result:
Perfect! I've successfully updated the MainContent.tsx component to use semantic color tokens instead of hardcoded colors. Here's a summary of the changes I made:

**Steps taken:**
1. Read current file
2. Replace gray title colors with text-foreground
3. Replace gray metadata colors with text-muted-foreground
4. Replace blue category badge with bg-primary/10 and text-primary
5. Replace gray tag colors with bg-accent and text-accent-foreground
6. Replace gray border with border-border
7. Replace blue navigation links with text-primary and hover:text-primary/80

The component now uses semantic color tokens that will properly adapt to your cream/off-white and red/orange color scheme while maintaining all existing functionality.
